about_the_game:
Traveling throughout the mysterious Beia Galaxy, weary Explorers finally find solace in the starry sky—a blue planet shining brightly, just like a long-lost home.
Step out of your Lander, my friend. You've landed on an uncharted planet. Now it's time to make it your home!
Can you harness this azure planet's resources and transform this wild territory into a thriving community?
The challenge is great, but the space brims with opportunities.



Master the land: Fell trees and mine resources to build everything you can imagine, from castles to gardens. Your dream life is just in your hands.

Live with yourself: Engage in farming and fishing, reap as you sow, and prepare meals from harvests. Your dedication will always be rewarded.



Social events: Immerse yourself in grand parties and epic festivals. Let's construct our dream haven together. The more, the merrier!

Develop survival skills: Catch exotic pets and tame mounts to give you a hand. Explore and solve puzzles, showcase your skills, and strategize to fight the wild Lords together. You will grow with every task you undertake.



Experience nature: From grasslands and rainforests to icefields and deserts, come to enjoy the breathtaking landscapes and embrace the wonders of nature.



Push the frontiers of technology: Dive into R&D, build rockets, and venture into space to uncover the vastness and secrets of the universe.



Embark on an extraordinary journey in Auroria and throw yourself into a world where imagination knows no bounds. Join forces with friends, craft your own destiny, and unravel the mysteries of this captivating celestial realm. The stars await your arrival— Let the adventure begin!

name: Auroria

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Auroria, an open-world, multiplayer, and cooperative sandbox game. Design the Base, survive with your pals, and start your own interstellar travel in a relaxed and fun way.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
